1768     278.04 278.06      .03  .03
1767     278.01 278.03      .03  .04
1766     277.98 277.99      .03  .03
1765     277.95 277.96      .02  .02


   ---   ---   ---   ---   ---

data format : i4, 4x, 2f7.2

Weighted smoothing spline fit, ice core and Mauna Loa CO2.
Data are for the standard case: growth rate of 1.7 ppmv/yr
for 1990.5. 50% attenuation at 23.4968; REG = 100.000.
Units are time in years, CO2 in ppmv, and d/dt of CO2 in
ppmv/yr.

Source:
 (1) Mauna Loa Observatory data -- C.D.Keeling and T.P.Whorf,
     Scripps Institution of Oceanography, La Jolla, California,
     U.S.A.
 (2) ice core data -- H.Friedli, H.Lotscher, E.Moor, A.Neftel,
     H.Oeschger, U.Siegenthaler, and B.Stauffer, University of
     Bern, Bern, Switzerland
